EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Contact.Name} this is it!
On March 5th 2016 you could be a part of the revolution that is NCS Action Day.
Across the country thousands of grads will be volunteering, fundraising or campaigning for local causes and being the change they want to see.
Epsom, Woking or Portsmouth? Where will you take action?
EPFEST
Free music festival in Epsom to raise money for local charity; My Time. Muisc that is making a diffrence
SIGN UP NOW!
NCS REBOOT
Rewind & relive your NCS moments with movies and games. Combating youth isolation in Woking
SIGN UP NOW!
SE3 FUN RUN
Sponsored run by the beach to raise money for 3 Portsmouth youth mental health charities
RESERVE YOUR SPACE!
JOIN THE NCS MEDIA TEAM
VIP on the day, you can report on the event via photo, video or text!
RESERVE YOUR SPACE!
Transport will be provided to and from the FUN RUN. There is an option to attend the Epsom & Woking event with our transport but spaces are limited. Transport will be first come, first served.
Like us on facebook and follow us on twitter to be kept up to date with the latest information.
If you have any questions do head to our fantastic new website or send an email to Kay at kay.obibi@the-challenge.org.
The Challenge Society team!
